logicalComponents
Interface HandChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
HandGraph, HandMeter, HandMeterdeprecated, HandRecorder
public interface HandChangeListener

This is the interface all classes must implement if they wish to receive event notifications from the Hand class. All events are fired on the event thread, identically to ActionListener.

Author:
DMac

Method Summary
 void handChanged(HandEvent he)
          This method is fired every time the state is changed in the Hand class.
 

Method Detail

handChanged

void handChanged(HandEvent he)
This method is fired every time the state is changed in the Hand class.

Parameters:
he - the HandEvent which contains information about the change of state of the Hand class.
